biotools.summary:
How accurate is circular dichroism-based model validation?.

Structure-based Empirical Spectrum Calculation Algorithm.

Max Planck Institute for Biophysical Chemistry.

Electronic circular dichroism (CD) spectroscopy is highly sensitive to changes in the backbone structure of proteins, and does not require special labelling, crystallization, or high protein concentrations.
